name: places/ChIJY4X8qRf2wokR5ygWY4BUI54
formattedAddress: 2103 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2103 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA

editorialSummary.text: Colorful ice cream parlor chain known for its many flavors plus sorbet & yogurt.

originalText.text: in this pool robinsa ice cream is not a good strong crystallization with pieces of ice.  cashier works with money and goods without wearing gloves.  but they work fast and it’s relatively clean here

text.text: in this pool robinsa ice cream is not a good strong crystallization with pieces of ice.  cashier works with money and goods without wearing gloves.  but they work fast and it’s relatively clean here

originalText.text:
Useless manager. She was on the phone the whole time unless she was fussing at staff. No one new the flavors. Cash only with no sign and no mention of it till it’s time to pay.

Also I tried calling 3 times… no answer. Ironic that she was on the phone. Smh.

text.text:
Useless manager. She was on the phone the whole time unless she was fussing at staff. No one new the flavors. Cash only with no sign and no mention of it till it’s time to pay.

Also I tried calling 3 times… no answer. Ironic that she was on the phone. Smh.

originalText.text:
I got ice cream and a pint for a party and I had started eating it and then they were like oh u have cash, right?

I was like no, I have card n Apple Pay.

"Ah sorry only cash"
"I'm already eating the ice cream are U serious??There's no sign or anything!!!"

I'm getting angry bc they're just like yea... nothing we can do...

I walked from 125 mind u. Bc that's the closest on in the way on the west side.

"Machine not working"

I'm like "can u open the other register?"
"Oh no sorry that one's is for the morning when it's busy, at night we only need one!"

"Well you don't even have one... just open it so I can pay. "

"Ohh no sorry"

Then another customer goes," I'd be mad too. I usually don't have cash. It's not safe. But they have an atm"

"Exactly, but no, atm  fee is like $3.00"
Customer" it's probably 99¢"
Me "Probably $3.00"

Employee" I think it's free"
Me *giving him the death glare* "it's never free"

I pull out a 20$
It's a $2.75 fee… obviously
I'm livid

"U should give me the ice cream for free "

They chuckle

"What's funny? I had to pay for your mistake!"

"Okay do u want a free donut"

"No, actually yea. I'll take the spider one"

"Oh... do u want any other one??"

*Me about to lose it at this woman*"its $2.75 and me fee was 2.75. And u offered are u kidding me?!!!! I'm not being difficult"

*gives me the donut* “Are u happy?"

"W/e" and leaves

originalText.text:
Uninformed manager. Cash only. But no mention until it’s time to pay… after the ice cream is in your hand…
Has no knowledge of the flavors, the fees, and no reserve to help customers.
Literally rude and useless.

Has no knowledge of the flavors, the fees, and no reserve to help customers.
Literally rude and useless.

originalText.text: This location is a combined Dunkin Donuts/BR. The dunkin side of the business is standard, but the only think BR about the place is the broken soft serve machine. We have gone in the place at least 4-5 times the last few months craving soft serve, and the machine has been out of service every time. I asked one of the employees if he had even seen the machine operational, and he said he didn't know. This place doesn't earn the Baskin-Robbins part of their name.

text.text: This location is a combined Dunkin Donuts/BR. The dunkin side of the business is standard, but the only think BR about the place is the broken soft serve machine. We have gone in the place at least 4-5 times the last few months craving soft serve, and the machine has been out of service every time. I asked one of the employees if he had even seen the machine operational, and he said he didn't know. This place doesn't earn the Baskin-Robbins part of their name.
